title: The Little Way for Every Day: Thoughts from Thérèse of Lisieux
features: An inspirational thought, accompanied by a scripture passage for each day of the year, from this popular doctor of the church. †
description: Patrick Ahern, an auxiliary bishop of New York, is widely regarded as one of the foremost experts on the spirituality of Saint Therese of Lisieux. He lives and works in Manhattan.
